title: Ordinary Diff Eqns I
description: This sequence develops the qualitative theory for systems of ordinary differential equations. Topics include stability, Lyapunov functions, Floquet theory, attractors, invariant manifolds, bifurcation theory, normal forms. First of two courses.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:

prerequisites: MATH 4542 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
